text: @realDonaldTrump As of yesterday, at least 1 in 686 New Yorkers have DIED because of COVID-19 — nearly 30,000 dead and it took 8 wks. Reopen the entire country now & see devastation on a national scale in the coming months. Too bad you won’t listen to the experts. Hell, you want packed stadiums.
